articles.author: Josh Dawsey, Isaac Arnsdorf, Perry Stein
articles.title: Trump-aligned group believed to have been attacked by Chinese hackers - The Washington Post
articles.description: Among the materials taken from the America First Policy Institute were recommendations for jobs in a second term and policy proposals.
articles.content: A political organization helping prepare for the potential presidential transition of Donald Trump recently experienced a cyberattack by what federal authorities believe are Chinese hackers, accordin… [+2068 chars]
